Generate array for pretty printing of matrix values

Source: R/utils.R
print_array.Rd

Generate array for pretty printing of matrix values

Usage

print_array(
  i = NULL,
  j = NULL,
  x = NULL,
  dims,
  rownames = rep("", dims[1]),
  fill = ".",
  digits = 5L
)

Arguments

i, j, x

matched vectors of integers in i and j, with value in x

dims

dimensions of the array (integer vector of 2)

fill

fill character

digits

default = 5. If numeric, round to this number of digits

On this page
